soccer.common

Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • soccer.common.World
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientWorld

    public abstract class World
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines common functionality shared by all applications in TOS bundle related to the world model
    Author:
    vkyrylov

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int calcCyclesBallToRoll(double distance, double speed)
      this method returns time (number of cycles) that it takes for the ball having initial speed to roll given distance.
      static double calcRiskOfKickingOutOfField(double direction, Vector2d endPos)
      This method returns the risk (a heuristic value) of getting out of the soccer field of the ball kicked in 'direction' to 'endPos' assuming that it would not be intercepted and would keep rolling some distance after endPos.
      static double calcRiskOfKickingOutOfField(Vector2d startPos, double direction, double force)
      This method returns the risk (a heuristic value) of getting out of the soccer field of the ball kicked from 'startPos' in 'direction' with 'force'

    • Method Detail

      • setInitPlayerPos

        public static void setInitPlayerPos()

      • inPenaltyArea

        public static boolean inPenaltyArea(char side0,
                    Vector2d pos,
                    double margin)
        This method returns true if the position is inside given penalty area within some margin. For the player client who uses mirror coordinates for the right-side team, this method must be only using side0=='l'
        Parameters:
        side0 - - team side
        pos - - position to be tested
        margin - - (negative - decreased size, positive - increased)
        Returns:
        true if pos in this area

      • calcRiskOfKickingOutOfField

        public static double calcRiskOfKickingOutOfField(Vector2d startPos,
                                 double direction,
                                 double force)
        This method returns the risk (a heuristic value) of getting out of the soccer field of the ball kicked from 'startPos' in 'direction' with 'force'

      • calcRiskOfKickingOutOfField

        public static double calcRiskOfKickingOutOfField(double direction,
                                 Vector2d endPos)
        This method returns the risk (a heuristic value) of getting out of the soccer field of the ball kicked in 'direction' to 'endPos' assuming that it would not be intercepted and would keep rolling some distance after endPos.

      • calcCyclesBallToRoll

        public static int calcCyclesBallToRoll(double distance,
                       double speed)
        this method returns time (number of cycles) that it takes for the ball having initial speed to roll given distance. (speed is measured in distance per simulation cycle)
